if is a bar page, pull page content
Making
Memories
Since 1928
Great Food
•
Cold Drinks
•
Live Music
Great Food
Great Food
​Flagler Tavern is unique in that we offer a full menu of premium quality food any time of day or night. Our award winning culinary team creates delicious entrees using only the finest of ingredients - fresh wild-caught seafood, hormone & antibiotic-free chicken, artisan breads, and Florida-raised beef. Choose from delectable salads, asian-inspired entrees, American favorites, indulgent pasta, and the freshest of seafood. We offer gluten-free options as well. No matter what you’re in the mood for - you’ll find it on our menu!  The best part is that it’s all cheerfully served by our Flagler Tavern family of employees (most of which have been a part of our team for years). Drop by for lunch or dinner any day of the week, or check out our brunch menu saturday & sunday mornings from 10am to 1pm.
View Menu
Cold Drinks
Cold Drinks
​Come check out the new upgraded wine list at our Bounty Bar! We are extremely proud to offer ALL 90+ point vintages at an amazing value. Or, if you are in the mood for a beer - we have over 30 drafts to choose from! With a full line of frozen creations, like the delicious “Chocolate Monkey” - Cruzan vanilla rum and Kahlua blended with vanilla ice cream & banana puree, topped with chocolate. With hand-crafted cocktails, unique specialty margaritas and an assortment of flavorful mules, the Flagler Tavern has something for everyone. The exclusive cocktail menu at our upstairs Bounty Bar features premium made-from-scratch creations, including our famous ‘smoked maple old fashioned.’ Choose from a distinctive selection of liquors and homemade infusions that you won’t find anywhere else.
Specialty Cocktails
Live Music
Live Music
​Flagler Tavern is proud to present a diverse lineup of musical talents including local acoustic solo & duo acts, nationally touring groups, and even a resident four-time grammy winner - with full live bands on the weekends. Performances are every evening from 5pm to 8pm, and all day saturday and sunday. Enjoy a delicious brunch or lunch while listening to eclectic musical performances on our outside deck. We adapt our live entertainment schedule to the NFL football season, as not to coincide with game broadcasts - so be sure to check our entertainment schedule for updates
View Calendar
.row
#post-##
Bar Areas
Each area has a different vibe, so belly-up and wind-down
Single Bar
Tavern Main Bar
Single Bar
Indigo at Flager Tavern
Single Bar
The Outside Decks
Single Bar
The Bounty Speakeasy

if is a bar page, pull page content
Let us host your next event or private party!
Flagler Tavern has ample space available for your corporate event, holiday party, wedding celebration, bridal shower, baby shower, birthday party, or other special event! Our staff will coordinate and cater your entire event, start to finish, based on your budget. From fully plated black tie events to a casual buffet of delicious hors d'oeuvres and cocktails, we can put together the perfect all-inclusive package for your event.
To book your date please fill out our
private events form
and a member of our event planning staff will contact you.
Main Bar
Flagler Tavern
Main Restaurant:
​Downstairs area with high top seating and plenty of room for big parties! Front and back rooms can be reserved, and our flexible event coordinating team can close off sections of the restaurant to allow for a fully private event.
Learn More
Pilar Bar
Indigo at Flagler Tavern:
​Immerse yourself in the cool blue vibe of the Indigo Bar, the central hub of the Flagler Tavern. Relax during the day, indulge in swanky happy hour cocktails, or enjoy vibrant weekend nightlife. Just steps from our outdoor decks, this intimate bar offers the perfect atmosphere for any mood. Tropical fish and jellyfish enhance the fun, lighthearted energy. Open for dining or drinks throughout the day and late into the evening, the Indigo Bar is the perfect spot to unwind and connect with friends.
Learn More
Downstairs Deck
Downstairs Deck:
​Our outdoor front and side decks are covered from the elements but offer a wonderful ocean breeze and a view of picturesque flagler avenue. Plenty of room for big parties.
Learn More
Bounty Bar
Bounty Bar & Upstairs Deck:
​The upstairs bounty bar is themed in a speakeasy style, offering a more intimate setting for guests. This area provides limited table height seating inside and on the uncovered portion of the outdoor deck, along with additional bar height seating under the deck’s covered areas. Though this area is on the second level of the Flagler Tavern, it is fully handicap accessible.
Learn More
Reserve A Venue
Download Brochure
.row
#post-##
